Docs.summary: Dynamically performs hit testing on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IncrementalHitTester dynamically determines whether the user "hits" a . This class enables you to provide immediate feedback to the user in situations such as selecting and erasing ink. There are two classes that inherit from IncrementalHitTester: - The hit tests strokes by determining whether a lasso path surrounds it. - The hit tests strokes by determining where an eraser path intersects it.
